extendedInfo.description: Which side will you choose when the two forces rise again?Inotia saga brought to the next level! ãInotia 4ãStride along with Kiyan, the Shadow Tribe's virtuoso, and Eara, the influential Channel of Light, in their fantasy adventure story. With improved graphics and storyline from the previous series, get indulged in the battles against goblins, orcs, and more!A new hero awaits to be released from his shadows, or not...in the all-new Inotian continent mobile RPG action game!âSupports: English, íêµ­ì´, æ¥æ¬èª, ä¸­æç®ä½, ä¸­æç¹é«.â  Feature Highlights â - 6 Classes, 90 SkillsChoose from 6 classes; Black Knight, Assassin, Warlock, Priest, and Ranger.15 different skills are added to each class. Combine all skills to customize your party's strategy.- Convenient Party SystemMercenaries can be recruited to your party anytime and anywhere. Once all mercenaries are recruited, 20 or more unique 'mercenary skills' will help you along your journey.- One Of The Largest Mobile RPG MapsDry deserts and freezing snowfields, mysterious forests and dark dungeons...400 maps with various themes to roam through!- A Tragic Destiny and Other Schemes await the Shadow Assassin and the Channel of LightA breathless chase-and-run story where the two heroes meet companions, enemies, and monsters; Be immersed in emotions as the darkness and light contradicts in force...Enjoy a stronger, and better, scenario. - Exclusive Sub-quests Ready To Be UnraveledEnjoy other sub-quests in each region of the Inotian continent besides the main story.As you accomplish the quests, you will get your hands on some extraordinary items.Listen to stories of each villager and monster to unfold other mysteries.- End of a Story means a Beginning of a New Journey: Infinite Dungeon for Hardcore PlayersCleared the whole story? Get ready to start a new one in Infinite Dungeon! 5 different memory layers will relocate you to a battle that was of your past...but different the next time.Fight villains that are even more vicious and smellier than the main story, to become the ultimate master of Inotia!ââââââââââââââââCom2uS: Your first search for fun!Check out these other exciting games by Com2uS!âââââââââââââââGolf Starâ¢: Experience the most vivid game of golf ever!Tiny Pop: A new super exciting bubble shooter!9 Innings: 2013 Pro Baseball: The Ultimate Baseball game!Tiny Farm: A Tiny Farm right in the palm of your hands!Heroes Warâ¢: Assemble the ultimate force of heroes to save the world!Other fun and exciting games are available, too!ââââââââââââââââPLAY WITH Com2uS!!ââââââââââââââââFollow us!twitter.com/Com2uSLike us on Facebook!facebook.com/Com2uSTips and Updateswww.com2us.com

reviews.comment: Its cool and ok but you gotta make the skills mo awesome just like zenonia\tIts cool
reviews.author: adriane Cabacungan

reviews.title: Cool and awesome app
reviews.comment: Nice game. I really enjoy this game too much...
reviews.author: Jeff Young

reviews.title: Pretty good
reviews.comment: Good game an fun fast loading on my galaxy player 5 just would be nice if you could change the hud around like size an all that.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: I like the game also the story its great and eara is pretty lol . Good job for the nice app keep up the good work
reviews.author: Carl Paner

reviews.title: Inotia 4 assassin or berkel
reviews.comment: Very good app and a well thought out game. Definitely enjoyable to pass the time
reviews.author: Nicholas Gawne

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: This really is an enjoyable game, quick and easy to learn.
reviews.author: Phillip Hollen

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Long playability... easy controls... several means to play the game.. online saving enables you to play on a diff device without having to start all over again..
reviews.author: Mary Joy Cajigal

reviews.title: Inotia 4
reviews.comment: So far so good. Still entertaining even when level grinding. Nice storyline so far. I\'ll give this game a 5 for now.
reviews.author: Marco Melvin Trinidad

reviews.title: 5 Stars
reviews.comment: Great game! Always wanted a good RPG for my phone that was free, and this is it! If it wasn\'t free, I still would have bought it. Great Stuff!
reviews.author: Patrick Yorkgitis

reviews.title: Great!!
reviews.comment: No one knows a good game till they play Inotia4. I would recommend this game to about anyone. Only a few things I don\'t care for: my stats never stay the same and controls aren\'t really that great (buttons too small).
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Decent
reviews.comment: The game\'s good. I\'m currently at a point where it seems I need to grind for experience and money though so that\'s a letdown. Overall alright game though
reviews.author: Damion Clay

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: Such a fantasric and addicting game. You dont even need to apend-real life money on it!
reviews.author: Bee Kay

reviews.comment: This game has incredibly advanced graphics, but the grammar usage leaves something to be desired. Meaning that when the characters speak in the game, it has the potential to confuse you.\tI do love this game, the action is intense and exciting.
reviews.author: BigNate Money

reviews.title: Great game so far
reviews.comment: Plays really well, good story, and funny characters. Good job.
reviews.author: garrett posedenti

reviews.title: Its worth it
reviews.comment: I like the game. That\'s about it. I would like it more if it had a better or at least easier way of making currency. Also more armor of different styles. Not the same piece of armor with a different color. Same for the weapons. Other than that, its a wonderful game.
reviews.author: Jose Pena

reviews.title: So far I love this game just much as the others.
reviews.comment: This game is amazing the graphics are good for this sort of game. Good story line. It is also fun.
reviews.author: Justin Macken

reviews.title: Issues
reviews.comment: Love the game played it before the previous updates. Now it wont let me check my inventory change gear etc. I run a galaxy s3
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Amazing game play and the story is gripping, all in all a great little app. Nice work.
reviews.author: Stuart Collins

reviews.title: Great rpg
reviews.comment: Love it, best rpg on android. Only tweak I would add is the controls. Only being able to move in the cardinal directions is a tad limiting. Love the item enhancement system though.
reviews.author: Cori Gawthrop

reviews.title: Awesome!!
reviews.comment: I am enjoying all inotias that com2us has made and this one has good gameplay awesome classes and a good story line keep up the good work :)
reviews.author: Gabriel Garcia
